heading: Our Clients Share Their Thoughts
description: Don't just take our word for it, see what our clients are saying:

testimonials.text: We have been working with Tersoft since 2006 as our specialized consultants in Sage 300, significantly automating our operations to the extent of having a fully integrated e-commerce with Sage 300 and sending and receiving purchase orders through EDI. The Tersoft team provides 24/7 support for our business operations, always with amazing results.

testimonials.text: Many ERP systems can meet the requirements one is looking for, but few have a human team willing and committed to ensuring the successful installation of the system in the client's operations. SAGE 300 and TERSOFT have that commitment and availability.
